name: Data Compressed - PowerShell
description: An adversary may compress data (e.g., sensitive documents) that is collected prior to exfiltration in order to make it portable and minimize the amount of data sent over the network.
false_positives: Highly likely if archive operations are done via PowerShell.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-Recurse* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*|* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*Compress\-Archive*)`
